item.title: Training/ Consultation
item.description: Our team will be available for consultation and training. Please contact us at statsnotebook[at]gmail.com Past workshops/ seminars 2020-12-08 Inverse Probability Treatment Weight and Marginal Structural Models

item.title: IPTW/MSM
item.description: Follow our Facebook page or our developer’s Twitter for more tutorials and future updates About this workshop Adjusting for time-varying confounders using IPTW for causal inference Randomized controlled trial is the gold standard for causal inference yet it is not always feasible. Multi-wave longitudinal data is increasingly used for causal inference. Standard methods such as regression yield biased results in the presence of time-varying confounders. In this workshop, I will demonstrate using Inverse probability treatment weight (IPTW) and marginal structural model (MSM) to adjust for time-varying confounders.
